revised_title: Investigating the Arrangement of Excitable Fibers in the Internal Capsule of Bonnet Monkeys
tldr: This study investigates the arrangement of excitable fibers in the internal capsule of bonnet monkeys, providing insights into the relationship between the fibers and the basal ganglia. The research also examines the lateral arrangement, antero-posterior order, and the average localization of each segment, contributing to the understanding of the nervous system's organization.
